docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column holds that more than other major sports leagues, NBA is extremely unlikely to have a dark-horse champion, largely because of the cap on individual players’ salaries; says it is no surprise that the two teams left standing are Miami Heat and San Antonio Spurs.

headline.main: Abandon Hope, Almost All Ye Who Enter the N.B.A. Playoffs

docs.snippet: Jerry Sandusky has been convicted and sentenced and lost an appeal, but the related prosecution of three former Penn State administrators accused of covering up child sex-abuse complaints about the former assistant football coach remains in legal ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Jerry Sandusky has been convicted and sentenced and lost an appeal, but the related prosecution of three former Penn State administrators accused of covering up child sex-abuse complaints about the former assistant football coach remains in legal limbo — a status that could soon change.

docs.snippet: Baseball on radio and television is the classic sport to nap to — especially on a drowsy Sunday afternoon....
docs.lead_paragraph: Baseball on radio and television is the classic sport to nap to — especially on a drowsy Sunday afternoon.
docs.abstract: Dana Jennings celebrates return of baseball season; notes that classic sport is perfect for listening to on radio or lazily watching on television and napping to, especially on drowsy Sunday afternoons.

headline.seo: Baseball on Radio and TV is Perfect to Nap To
